Name: NodeAddedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node is added to the diagram.

Name: NodeClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@onclick</c> event occurs on a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: NodeDoubleClickedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when an <c>@ondblclick</c> event occurs on a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: NodePointerDownEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer (e.g., mouse or touch) is pressed down on a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: NodePointerEnterEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer enters the bounds of a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: NodePointerLeaveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer leaves the bounds of a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: NodePointerMoveEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer moves over a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: NodePointerUpEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a pointer is released from a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: NodePositionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node's position changes.

Name: NodeRedrawEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a redraw is manually requested for a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that requested the redraw.

Name: NodeRemovedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node is removed from the diagram.

Name: NodeSelectionChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a node is selected or deselected.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> whose selection state changed.

Name: NodeSizeChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the size (width or height) of a node changes.

Name: NodeVisibilityChangedEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the visibility state of a node changes.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> whose visibility state changed.

Name: NodeWheelEvent
Summary: Event triggered when the mouse wheel is scrolled while over a node.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> that triggered the event.

Name: PortAddedToNodeEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is added to a node's collection.

Parameters.Name: Node
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> the port was added to.

Name: PortRemovedFromNodeEvent
Summary: Event triggered when a port is removed from a node's collection.

Parameters.Name: Model
Parameters.Documentation: The <see cref="T:Blazor.Flows.Nodes.INode" /> the port was removed from.
